content:
Add a Text Area Input Element to a FlexCard Available beginning Winter '22. The Text Area input element enables users to enter multiple lines of plain text. Don't use symbols that can break or escape JSON and cause an Unterminated string in JSON error, such as " \ \n \r \\. From the Build panel, click Inputs, and drag the Text Area element onto the canvas. Configure properties: * Element Name * Field Binding (bind to a data field) * Field Label * Placeholder * Required * Read-only * Help Text * Default Value * Minimum Length * Maximum Length Select to create new lines of text with
or \n. Click + Add New in Custom Attributes to configure additional properties. Add an action, conditions, or style your element.
title: Adding a Text Area Input Element to a FlexCard in OmniStudio
